price: 还有别的，你们尚未能获得的，安拉确已周知它。安拉对于万事是全能的。
arabic: وَأُخۡرَىٰ لَمۡ تَقۡدِرُواْ عَلَيۡهَا قَدۡ أَحَاطَ ٱللَّهُ بِهَاۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٗا

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: wa-ukh'rā lam taqdirū ʿalayhā qad aḥāṭa al-lahu bihā wakāna al-lahu ʿalā kulli shayin qadīran
